author: Al Jazeera
title: North Korea insists it is free of coronavirus
description: The nuclear-armed nation shut down its borders in January after the virus was first detected in neighbouring China.
content:
North Korea remains totally free of coronavirus, a senior health official insisted, despite mounting scepticism overseas as confirmed global infections approach one million.
The already isolated, nuclear-armed country quickly shut down its borders and impose… [+2800 chars]
